data.fullContent: George had a deal going with his print shop, but he didn't feel like he was getting the best deal possible. He wanted to change the terms of the contract he had but he figured he would probably just need to change printers. George did some research and found that he could get a much better deal with a new printer. He decided to make the switch, and his new printer gave him many more options than his old printer could provide. His new printer offered faster service and a much better service plan. It's been two years since he started working with this new printer, and he's never been happier.
